Class ValidateInput

  • java.lang.Object
    • it.polimi.ingsw.client.ValidateInput

  • public class ValidateInput
extends java.lang.Object
    Public class with the function of validating keyboard inputs.

                               int size)
        Returns true if the index belongs to the array.
        Parameters:

        size - the size of the array.
        Returns:
        true if the index belongs to the array; false otherwise.

      • checkWindowName

        public boolean checkWindowName(java.util.ArrayList<java.lang.String> windowNames,
                               java.lang.String insertName)
        Returns true if the name entered match exactly the name of a window actually present.
        Parameters:
        windowNames - the names of all the present windows.
        insertName - the name entered.
        Returns:
        true if the name entered match exactly the name of a window actually present; false otherwise.

      • checkToolCardInArray

        public boolean checkToolCardInArray(int index)
        Returns true if the chosen tool card index belongs to the set of tool cards actually present.
        Parameters:
        index - the chosen tool card index.
        Returns:
        true if the index belongs to the size of the set of tool cards; false otherwise;

      • increaseOrDecreaseChoice

        public boolean increaseOrDecreaseChoice(int i)
        Returns true if the choice, expressed by the value of i, to increase or decrease the value of the die is correct.
        Parameters:
        i - the choice to decrease or increase, as an integer.
        Returns:
        true if i is 1 or if i is 0; false otherwise.

      • checkDieValue

        public boolean checkDieValue(int i)
        Returns true if the chosen value belongs to the set of correct dice values.
        Parameters:
        i - chosen die value.
        Returns:
        true if the chosen value belongs to the set of correct dice values. false otherwise.
